MAP

220 Hotel Liabeny

Located just 200 m from Puerta del Sol in the centre of Madrid, Liabeny includes a gym with a sauna.

Offering classic services such as turndown, concierge and bellboy, Hotel Liabeny offers traditional accommodation withing walking distance to the most popular attractions such as Plaza mayor, Royal Palace or Debod Temple.

Rooms at Hotel Liabeny feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, the private bathroom comes with free toiletries.

Many of Madrid‚Äôs attractions are just a short walk from the Liabeny. The Prado and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museums are less than 10 minutes away.

Double room for single use: 220‚Ç¨ Breakfast and VAT inc

As the hotel is located in a semi-pedestrian street, the hotel rates are including the transfer from/to the Airport: 3 vans up to 21 pax

250 Hotel Catalonia Atocha

This stylish hotel has a furnished roof terrace with a seasonal hot tub, bar and wonderful views of Madrid. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Atocha Train Station is 500 m away.

Hotel Catalonia Atocha is situated within 600 m of the Reina Sofia and Prado Museums. The lively tapas bars of La Latina are a 10-minute walk away. Ant√≥n Mart√≠n Metro Station is just 50 m from the hotel.

The hotel‚Äôs air-conditioned rooms are decorated in elegant light colours and have wooden floors. Each room has a minibar and a safe. Bathrooms come with a large shower.

The Catalonia Atocha offers a daily buffet breakfast, including local cured meats, cheese and pastries. Traditional Spanish cuisine is served in the restaurant, and there is also a snack bar.

Double room for single use: 250‚Ç¨ Breakfast and VAT inc

275 Hotel Iberostar Las Letras Gran Via

Set in a restored historic building, this design hotel offers a seasonal rooftop terrace with a stylish bar and a seasonal pool with spectacular views over Madrid. Rooms have a flat-screen TV. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout.

Iberostar Las Letras Gran Via has a literary theme, and includes a well-stocked library. Rooms have high ceilings, large windows and a seating area. They are individually decorated with quotes by famous writers and poets.

The hotel‚Äôs restaurant, serves informal haute-cuisine. There is also an en elegant and peaceful lounge bar, which offers breakfast, snacks and tapas throughout the day. By night it transforms into a lively bar, with innovative cocktails and mixed drinks.

Located on Gran V√≠a Avenue, the Iberostar Las Letras Gran Via is a 10-minute walk from the Thyssen-Bornemisza and Prado Museums. Puerta del Sol is 500 m away, and the hotel is only 150 m from Gran Via Metro Station.

Double room for single use: 275‚Ç¨ Breakfast and VAT inc

374 Hotel Paseo del Arte

Located in Madrid‚Äôs Art Triangle, Hotel Paseo Del Arte is just 300 m from Atocha AVE Train Station. This design hotel offers a gym, restaurant and rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Rooms at Paseo Del Arte feature minimalist design and plenty of natural light. They all include air conditioning and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

This hotel offers a business centre and 24-hour front desk. The hotel‚Äôs caf√© overlooks Reina Sofia Museum.

Hotel Paseo Del Arte is within a 10-minute walk of the Thyssen-Bornemisza and Prado Museums. The popular tapas bars of Santa Ana Square are 800 m away, and the Retiro Park is 600 m away.

Double room for single use: 374‚Ç¨ Breakfast and VAT inc
